channel.title: j436zhu on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Jingwen (Monica) Zhu
item.description: Jingwen (Monica) received her undergrad education from University of Toronto. She completed her masters on Laser ablation systems for ion loading, and now she explores Floquet systems on the Amethyst machine.
